import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const Cart = (props) => { const temp = props.purchaseItems const [total, setTotal] = useState(0) function amount() { let sum = 0 for (let i = 0; i < temp.length; i++) { sum += temp[i].price } console.log('test ' + sum) setTotal(sum) } useEffect(() => { amount() }) console.log(temp) return ( <>

Shopping Cart

{temp.map((data, index) => { return ( <>
{data.title}
Rs. {data.price}/-

{data.description}

{/* amount.push({data.price}) */} ) })}

Your Order

{temp.map((data, index) => ( ))}
Product Subtotal
{data.title} Rs. {data.price}/-
Total
Rs. {total}/-
) } export default Cart
